issue.title: [CI][C++] Add a nightly build for C++20 compilation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18206](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18206). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently have a `test-ubuntu-20.04-cpp-17` nightly job that has become redundant since the switch to C\+\17. We could instead turn this job into a C\\+20-enabled build job, to weed out any potential incompatibilities.
